axis_supply.supply_status: Strained but adequate for defensive operations, insufficient for sustained offensive operations. Primary constraint: fuel and ammunition delivery from Tripoli (1,800km). British interdiction of coastal shipping creates periodic supply crises. Water supply critical in desert environment. Captured British supplies supplement German logistics but unreliable.

allied_supply.supply_status: Strained during Operation Crusader. Forward supplies adequate for defensive operations but insufficient for sustained offensive. Primary constraint: 1100km supply line from Mersa Matruh railhead. Water critical in desert environment - 4.5L per man per day. Frequent vehicle breakdowns due to sand abrasion on engines.
